ygData.msgSnippet: Feel bad? I m feelin proud! That s gotta be one of the best drawings I ve ever made! You becha it took skill, it took alotta skill! ... I m bouncy, trouncy,

Feel bad? I'm feelin' proud! That's gotta be one of the best drawings 
I've ever made! You becha it took skill, it took alotta skill!



------------------------------------
I'm bouncy, trouncy, flouncy, pouncy
Fun, fun, fun, fun, fun

But the most wonderful thing about Yanshosh is
I'm the only one

IIIIIII'mmmmmm the only one!



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OO: Oh, yes, I looked at it. If I tried to draw something that I 
didn't copy
> from a book, it would look like that. I have alot of Pokemon 
drawings, but
> they don't go on a Transformer's page. Don't get me wrong, though, 
Pokemon
> makes for a lovely game... and an idiotic and crappy cartoon. No 
offense to
> anyone who actually likes it, though. In the future I might try to 
draw
> something, but I just don't have the talent for that kind of thing. 
So don't
> feel bad, Zardus...
>
